com.siimkinks.sqlitemagic

Class QueryObservable<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • rx.Observable<Query<R>>
      • com.siimkinks.sqlitemagic.QueryObservable<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - Query return type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CountQueryObservable

    public class QueryObservable<R>
extends rx.Observable<Query<R>>
    An Observable of Query which offers query-specific convenience operators.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class rx.Observable

        rx.Observable.OnSubscribe<T>, rx.Observable.Operator<R,T>, rx.Observable.Transformer<T,R>

    • Method Detail

      • runQuery

        @NonNull
 @CheckResult
public final rx.Observable<R> runQuery()
        Runs each emitted query and propagates its result(s) to downstream as a single item.

        Be careful using this operator as it will always consume the entire cursor and create objects for each row, every time this observable emits a new query. On tables whose queries update frequently or very large result sets this can result in the creation of many objects.

        This operator ignores null values returned from running Query.

      • runQueryOrDefault

        @NonNull
 @CheckResult
public final rx.Observable<R> runQueryOrDefault(R defaultValue)
        Runs each emitted Query and propagates its result(s) to downstream as a single item.

        Be careful using this operator as it will always consume the entire cursor and create objects for each row, every time this observable emits a new query. On tables whose queries update frequently or very large result sets this can result in the creation of many objects.

        This operator emits defaultValue if null is returned from running Query.

        Parameters:
        defaultValue - Value emitted if Query result is null

      • runQueryOnce

        @NonNull
 @CheckResult
public final rx.Observable<R> runQueryOnce()
        Runs only the first emitted Query and propagates its result(s) to downstream as a single item.

        This operator ignores null values returned from running Query.

      • runQueryOnceOrDefault

        @NonNull
 @CheckResult
public final rx.Observable<R> runQueryOnceOrDefault(R defaultValue)
        Runs only the first emitted Query and propagates its result(s) to downstream as a single item.

        This operator emits defaultValue if null is returned from running Query.

        Parameters:
        defaultValue - Value emitted if Query result is null
